argument: The campsite is on the opposite bank of the
lake and cannot be reached by car. Please
walk along the road around the lake.

argument: Enjoy the nature of Lake Shibire, which was
once counted as one of the Fuji Hakkai and
was famous for its autumn colors.

キャンプ場管理人（四尾連湖）

argument: Here, there is a legend that at three
o'clock, the ghost of a monster called
Ushioni, who was defeated by a samurai in the
past, appears on the surface of the lake.
message.name: キャンプ場管理人（四尾連湖）

argument: Please be careful at the time of three.
